TEXT.TITLE: CANADA FEBRUARY CONSUMER PRICES UP 0.4 PCT
TEXT.BODY: The Canadian consumer price index rose 0.4 pct in February, to 135.8, base 1981, compared with a 0.2 pct rise in January and a 0.4 pct rise in February last year, Statistics Canada said. The February year-one year rise was 4.0 pct compared with a 3.9 pct rise in January.R Reuter
